name: Axe
description: Axe is a weapon that has a heavy metal head with a sharp edge.

name: Sword
description: The sword is often referred to as the king of weapons.

name: Double-Handed Sword
description: Can cut a foe in half and break armour apart.

name: Double-Handed Hammer

name: Double-Handed Axe

name: Spear
description: A long, pointed weapon used for thrusting or throwing.

name: Bow
description: Range 24" and Strength 3.

name: Short Bow
description: Range 16" and Strength 3.

name: Light Armor
description: Saving throw of 6.

name: Heavy Armor
description: Basic D6 saving throw of 5+. If wearing a shield too suffers a -1 movement penalty.

name: Shield
description: Basic save of 6.

name: Buckler
description: Small shield.

name: Helmet
description: A helmet is a form of protective gear worn to protect the head.

name: Flail
description: A weapon consisting of a striking head attached to a handle by a flexible rope, strap, or chain.

name: Daemon Soul
description: This gives him a 4+ save against the effects of spells or prayers.

name: Great Claw
description: He may carry no weapons in this arm, but gains an extra attack in hand-to-hand combat with a +1 strength bonus.

name: Cloven Hoofs
description: The warrior gains +1 movement.

name: Tentacle
description: One of the mutant's arms ends in a tentacle. He may grapple his opponent to close combat to reduce his attacks by -1, down to a minimum of 1. The mutant may decide which attack his opponent loses.

name: Blackblood
description: If the model loses a wound in close combat, anyone in base contact with the model suffers a strength 3 hit (no critical hits from the spurting corrosive blood.

name: Spines
description: Any model in base contact with he mutant suffers an automatic strength 1 hit at the beginning of each close combat phase. Spines will never cause critical hits.

name: Extra Arm
description: The mutant may use any single-handed weapon in the extra arm, giving him +1 attack when fighting in hand-to-hand combat. Alternatively, he may carry a shield or a buckler in the extra arm. If a possessed chooses to do this, he gains an extra attack but still cannot carry a weapon.

name: Hideous
description: The mutant causes fear. See the psychology section for details.

name: Halberd
description: Strength as user +1

name: Blowpipe
description: A weapon for shooting darts, typically made of a curved piece of wood whose ends are joined by a taut string.

name: Sling
description: Looped strip of leather used for throwing stones.

name: Throwing Stars
description: A small, easily concealed weapon.

name: Scorpion Tail
description: Make an extra strength 5 attack in each hand-to-hand combat phase. If the model hit by the tail is immune to poison, the strength of the hit is reduced to 2.
